# README-Generator

![License Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)

## Description
This application was built to help developers automate the README creation process.

## Table of Contents
 - [Installation](#installation)
 - [Usage](#usage)
 - [License](#license)
 - [Contributing](#contributing)
 - [Tests](#tests)
 - [Questions](#Questions)

## Installation
Clone the code repository from Github, and then run npm install in the terminal.

## Usage
Run node index to start the application.
